Title: <title>Stand With Us Breaking News</title>
Description: <description>Twelve innocent Israeli Druze children and teenagers were murdered yesterday when Hezbollah launched a rocket from Lebanon that struck a soccer field in Majdal Shams
Link: a Druze town in the Golan Heights of northern Israel. May their memories forever be a blessing. ??#alleyesonmajdalshams #israelunderattack #majdalshamsmassacre</description>

Title: <title>Stand With Us Breaking News</title>
Description: <description>Yesterday
Link: terror group Hezbollah committed a massacre in Majdal Shams
pubDate: a Druze town in the Golan Heights of northern Israel. A rocket fired by Hezbollah from Lebanon struck a soccer field
column5: murdering 12 innocent Israeli Druze children and teenagers and injuring many others who were simply playing and enjoying being kids. May their memories forever be a blessing. ??#alleyesonmajdalshams #israelunderattack #majdalshamsmassacre</description>

Title: <title>Stand With Us Breaking News</title>

pubDate: northern Israel. May their memories forever be a blessing. ??Photo by David Cohen/Flash90</description>
